name: Yuletide Bouquet
description:
This game happens outside of the screen.

Be with your loved ones on Christmas day and just start the game.

The Yule log burns and burns.

Sometimes things will happen and you'll be prompted to do nice things.

Just do them if you feel it.

PS: keep in mind that things appear every 1-3 minutes. This game is meant to be slow. Relax, have patience!

Game made for Ludum Dare 37, please rate it if you like!
